about_the_game:
A new costume for Erwin is added.
Western armor for Erwin. Enjoy battles and daily life sections in new fashion.

▼How to use
You can access the new costume by performing either of the following:
1. Select "Another Mode" on the main menu, and then select Erwin.
Change into the costume "Knight Outfit" by selecting "Character Editor" when you are near the tent on the field.
2. Select "Story Mode" on the main menu, and then approach Erwin in the Daily Life section.
Change into the costume "Knight Outfit" by selecting "Change outfit" when you are near Erwin.
